    fmt.Println("Event messages for stream " + *logStreamName + " in log group  " + *logGroupName)

    gotToken := ""
    nextToken := ""

    for _, event := range resp.Events {
        gotToken = nextToken
        nextToken = *resp.NextForwardToken

        if gotToken == nextToken {
            break
        }

        fmt.Println("  ", *event.Message)
